_header: Whoso will been rich and having
_description: The price of wealth — one couplet translating ‘Nam qui diuites volunt fieri…’ (1 Tim. 6.9) which precedes it in John Grimestone’s sermon notebook

NLS18721.Transcription:
Wo so wile ben riche & hauingHe fallet in þe fendes
                    fonding
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 15.
